    • Method Detail

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd()
        Method to load the InterstitialAd content. When it is ready, the InterstitialAdListener.onAdReady(InterstitialAd) will be called. InterstitialAdListener.onAdError(InterstitialAd, AdError) will be called. Uses the AdRequest.defaultRequest(Context) as AdRequest Can only be called once per InterstitialAd object. Must be called on the MainThread.

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd(AdRequest request)
        Method to load the InterstitialAd content. When it is ready, the InterstitialAdListener.onAdReady(InterstitialAd) will be called. InterstitialAdListener.onAdError(InterstitialAd, AdError) will be called. Can only be called once per InterstitialAd object. Must be called on the MainThread.
        Parameters:
        request - the parameters that will serve as a filter on the advertisement request. If none is setted, it will use the AdRequest.defaultRequest(Context) as AdRequest

      • show

        public void show()
        Method to present the InterstitialAd on the screen. After being caled, it will fill the screen with the advertisement content. Can only be called once per InterstitialAd object. Must be called on the MainThread

      • setInterstitialAdListener

        public void setInterstitialAdListener(InterstitialAdListener listener)
        Sets the InterstitialAdListener
        Parameters:
        listener - the InterstitialAdListener

      • setRequestTimeout

        public void setRequestTimeout(int timeoutInSeconds)
        Sets the timeout for the InterstitialAd request.
        Parameters:
        timeoutInSeconds - the timeout in seconds
